1.text: Nana came into the room with a puzzled look on her face.

2.text: She held up an orange sock and a blue one.

3.text: My daughter jumped up and grabbed the blue one out of her hand.

4.text: She took off running down the hall while waving the sock in the air.

5.text: Nana chased her down, caught her, and tickled her until she laughed.
